item.title: Using R Markdown for recurring Reports
item.description: In this post I will show you some of my best practises for using R Markdown for reporting. We will cover How to create tables with conditional formating with kableExtra How to include your results in the (Markdown) text How to include global variables. Create formated tables with kableExtra The basics kableExtra is an awesome library that allows you to format and style your tables.
